Minimum system requirements

* OS: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7
* CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.66 GHz or similar AMD
* RAM: 2 GB

Recommended system requirements

* VGA: GeForce GT 440 or Radeon HD 3800 series

First things first, to all the people crying about slow DL speeds, I have 2 things to say. First, STFU cause you're getting something for pretty much free, which means you really have no reason to be complaining. And on top of that, if it's such a problem why not go directly to BlackBox and download from there. I got the bigger version, 7gigs or wtv, with constant 350kbps+ speed.

Now that that's done, on to relevant information. For starters I think this game has some issues. My CPU and Ram are above the max requirements, while my GFX unfortunately is listed in the minimum. Still, all in all I was expecting decent results. And yet the results I got were annoying, and apparently I'm not alone with this problem.

At 1280x1024 resolution with all at max I get around 23-25 FPS, low drops to 18 and high is about 29. I started playing with settings, and saw no real results. So I turned everything to the barest minimum with 640x480 resolution, and what happened? Nothing really..I get the same damn FPS at max as I do at min. Which is completely ridiculous.

And NO, before anybody bothers it has absolutely nothing to do with my hardware or drivers, everything is up to date and everything works perfectly fine. So my only real option is to tough it out and wait for a patch. But the 23-25 FPS so far is pretty playable, with no significant lag, although I have yet to reach any GFX heavy situations so I can't say for sure. Still, I'm mostly just happy it's on PC finally!

For the record, my system is Core 2 Quad 2.6ghz, 5gigs DDR2 ram, and GeForce GT 430 1gb GPU. Even with the new Beta driver nVidia has and the Prototype 2 specific settings, it makes no difference at all. But it won't stop me from enjoying!
BlackBox is the shit.. and Stifmeister is the man!

In case some people misunderstood the previous comment. basically all I was trying to promote was that the people behind BlackBox are amazing and smart, and that Mr Stiffy Stiff is great also. Props.

I'm not endorsing Prototype 2 tho... Just to clarify.

 PainkilleR.99 at 2012-08-15 17:21 CET:
I found a solution to the memory leak of Prototype 2 !! if you have ATI Radeon graphic card download a software called Ati Tray tools install it then go to the 3D category you should find "Flip Queue Size" and set it to 1, if you have Nvidia then simply go to the control panel look for "Pre Rendered Frames" and set it to 1 !! i tried it and it works fine now exept for some loss of FPS but the game is still playable

@ FreeISO - only thing that is outdated is my GPU and I know that, but I saw some gameplays in youtube with Nvidia 9800 GT (and that GPU is little bit slower then mine) but it works pretty much ok without any laggs. How do you explain that. So the game likes Nvidia more then Ati?
